description: A lorry driver is arrested after a car driver died in a crash on the A27 in East Sussex.
title: Lorry driver arrested over A27 crash death
title_page: Lorry driver arrested over A27 crash death - BBC News
maintext:
A lorry driver has been arrested after a car driver died in a crash on the A27 in East Sussex.
The 49-year-old Volvo driver from Hildenborough in Kent died in the crash with a container lorry on Thursday.
The lorry overturned on the westbound A27 outside Folkington Manor, between Polegate and Drusillas roundabout.
The 53-year-old male driver from Wiltshire was arrested on suspicion of causing death by dangerous driving.
A lorry travelling ahead of the Volvo took evasive action, but its load of scaffolding hit a VW Transporter van, police said.
The driver of the scaffolding lorry - a 45-year-old man from Eastbourne - and a 46-year-old woman from Wadhurst driving the VW van were unhurt.
The arrested man has been released on bail until 27 May.
